reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks exactly like the picture and appreciate its professional appearance, with one noting its beautiful pleating. The dress receives positive feedback for its color, comfort, and overall quality as a work outfit. The fit and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some say it fits beautifully, others find it too tight in the chest area and too small. The material quality is also mixed, with some praising it while others find it cheaply made, and several customers note that the dress does not come with a belt. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sheer pleated dress. Good for petite.
items.body: Very cute dress. I purchased xs in black and it's alittle snug in the shoulder and bust area. The length was perfect. I'm 4'11" about 118lbs and have a pear shape. The belt isn't great quality. Wear with ankle strap sandals, gold jewelry, clutch bag. Nice for a casual event but need to look modest and put together. The material has a sheer top layer and solid underneath. Sleeves sheer. Button cuffs. Recommend if you're on the smaller side in bust area. Recommend. Read more
items.author: Cathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Stylish â€“ Perfect for Work!
items.body: Iâ€™m very happy with the Able Tree Business Casual Shirt Dress. The fabric feels soft and breathable, making it comfortable for all-day wear. The fit is true to size, and the design is classy yet versatileâ€”great for the office or casual outings. I love the quality of the stitching and buttons; it feels durable and well-made. Itâ€™s easy to style with flats or heels, and it washes well without losing shape or color. Overall, this dress combines comfort, style, and practicalityâ€”highly recommended! Read more
items.author: Louna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress - wrong size belt
items.body: Beautiful mint color. The fabric is SO pretty, very flowy and soft. Not heavy. Perfect for the occasion. The only reason I took off one star is the belt. While the dress (size Large) fit perfectly even with a little extra room, the belt was way too small. I couldnâ€™t even reach the first belt opening. Maybe it was a mix up and they sent the wrong one. Other than that, it is a GREAT dress. I just need to find a different belt for it. Read more
items.author: Kathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Modest!
items.body: Beautiful dress. Iâ€™m 5â€™1 usually a size 4 in jeans and got the small size. It doesnâ€™t fit too long nor too tight. Itâ€™s just right. Itâ€™s very modest and perfect for any occasion. The length goes to under my knees. Itâ€™s very comfortable with my bust size 36. An x-small is a 2-4 but I think it wouldâ€™ve been tight on my bust. So a Small is perf . The material is kind of delicate and thin so just be careful about that. I would buy other colors!! Just get it!! Read more
items.author: Em

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Received dress that had body odor
items.body: Other reviewers pointed these two things out already: 1. The dress is really small in the bust, even if it fits everywhere else. 2. Others noted that they received a dress that was worn before. Mine was definitely worn before because of the foul body odor I could smell on it. I almost wanted to try to wash it, but seriously the smell was so bad, I couldnâ€™t get myself to keep it. I considered re ordering it but I did not want to risk getting the same one again, and the bust being too small just solidified my decision not to pursue this one. Pretty dress otherwise. Read more
items.author: danielle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect work outfit
items.body: I received so many compliments at a work event. Strangers coming up to me to compliment my look. It does not come with the belt so I paired it with a black belt with gold hardware that matched the buttons. Iâ€™m apple shaped, 180 lbs, with DD chest and got the XXL. Fit perfectly with some wiggle room in the chest area so the girls werenâ€™t trying to bust through the seams. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Kevin Bielski

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disgusting Stain on Newly Unwrapped Dress
items.body: I overnighted this dress for a big conference tomorrow but I was sorely disappointed and disgusted. The package was visually unopened and assumed to be new but when I tried the dress on it had been worn and repackaged with large makeup stains all over the dress. Returning immediately. Read more
items.author: Kristen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Itâ€™s a nice professionally designed dress
items.body: Excellent dress for taller women. I am 5â€™5â€ 140lbs with a bigger waistline 33â€. I usually wear a medium but Because they did not state that the waist was elasticized I ordered a large to be on the safe side. I find that the torso of the dress especially the center front is a bit longer than it should be. If I had ordered the medium I think it would be a better fit. I love the color (royal blue ) and the material Is nice, itâ€™s 100% polyester but it looks like Crepe. So instead of returning it I decided to just fix it (I can sew) but I didnâ€™t have to sew anything I tried shrinking it first by washing it on a warm cycle and drying it on a warm cycle ( not hot ) and removing it from the dryer immediately after the dryer stops and instead of hanging it up I just lightly folded it and let it sit until itâ€™s cold. The length shrank about a half of an inch which helped. It can be worn as a slight blouse on over the belt. I got a silver belt to match the buttons. Read more
items.author: F. W. S

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Wine, Black, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Green, Mint Green, Lilac Purple, Blush Pink, Black Lurex, Beige, Yellow, Royal Blue, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
